name: vtk-wasm-benchmark
description: A suite of benchmarks for VTK C++ with WebAssembly.

scripts.build-wasm: docker run -v $(pwd):$(pwd) -w $(pwd) -e USE_VTK_BUILD_TYPE=Release kitware/vtk-emscripten:latest /bin/bash -c 'cmake -S src -B build-emscripten -GNinja -DVTK_DIR=/VTK-install/Release/lib/cmake/vtk-9.2; cmake --build build-emscripten'
scripts.build-wasm:debug: docker run -v $(pwd):$(pwd) -w $(pwd) -e USE_VTK_BUILD_TYPE=Debug kitware/vtk-emscripten:latest /bin/bash -c 'cmake -S src -B build-emscripten -GNinja -DVTK_DIR=/VTK-install/Debug/lib/cmake/vtk-9.2 -DDEBUGINFO=DEBUG_NATIVE -DOPTIMIZE=NO_OPTIMIZATION && cmake --build build-emscripten'
